import React from "react" // import avatar from "../../assets/images/Mohan-muruge.jpg" import "./Comments.scss" function Comments(props) { let date = new Date(props.timestamp).toLocaleDateString("en-us", { day: "2-digit", month: "2-digit", year: "numeric" }) console.log(props.commentId) return (
{/* */}

{props.name}

{date}

{props.comment}

) } export default Comments
